subject: World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Resi Stiegler of the United States, a slalom specialist, will be sidelined two months after a crash Friday during the first run of a World Cup giant slalom in Lienz, Austria. Stiegler, 22, sustained a broken left forearm and right shinbone and torn knee ligaments. She will have surgery.
